wikitext.*:
'''Lynn Maudlin''', singer-songwriter and artist, created [[The 1990 NOT Tolkien Calendar]] for [[The Mythopoeic Society]] in 1989. Lynn was the North American Booking Officer for [[The Tolkien Society]]'s 1992 [[Tolkien Centenary Conference]] and acted as conference committee liaison to the [[Mythopoeic Society]].
